name: data-hub-api-spec
description: Data Hub REST API documentation and test server

scripts.makeyaml: cat specs/headers/swagger_head.yml specs/headers/schemes.yml specs/headers/security.yml specs/headers/paths.yml specs/paths/* specs/headers/definitions.yml  specs/definitions/*  > datahub.yml && ./node_modules/swagger/bin/swagger.js validate datahub.yml
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run generate-node && npm run swaggerui

author: Jim Smith
